attributes.action: UK government will ensure that we will not be signing the UN migration pact.
attributes.additional_details: We require our government to state publicly that this country will not be signing this, or any variation of this, agreement.
attributes.background: The government is to vow and assure the peoples of the UK and the world that we will not accept the UN migration pact making migration a human right. Such a right violates the rights of indigenous peoples to live in safety.
